chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)
gb: mon n * bool -> bool
gm: mon n * bool -> mon n

Goal:
forall a b : Term A n, zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb)

Premises:
zeroP : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> Prop
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
CoefStructure : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
OrderStructure : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
divTerm : Term A n -> forall b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> Term A n
right : ?B -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> mon n |- Prop]
left : ?A -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> mon n |- Prop]
pair : ?A -> ?B -> ?A * ?B where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> mon n |- Type]
divTerm_dec : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, {eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b)} + {~ eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b)}
multTerm_zeroP_div : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a \/ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b
nzeroP_multTerm : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b)
divTerm_nZ : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb)
zeroP_dec : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (x : Term A n), {zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) x} + {~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) x}
A_sep : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall a b : A, eqA (multA a b) A0 -> eqA a A0 \/ eqA b A0
zeroP_comp_eqTerm : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b
nzeroP_comp_eqTerm : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b
T1_nz : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall n : nat, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n)
zeroP_multTerm_r : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) b a)
zeroP_multTerm_l : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b)
divTerm_eqT : forall a b c : Term A n, eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> forall nZc : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) c, eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=c) nZc) c) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) b (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm b (b:=c) nZc) c)
zeroP_invTerm_zeroP : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a : Term A n), zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) a)
nZero_invTerm_nZero : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a : Term A n), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) a)
nZero_invTerm_T1 : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall n : nat, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n))
plusTerm_invTerm_zeroP : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a : Term A n), zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a (invTerm invA (n:=n) a))
zeroP_minusTerm : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a : Term A n), zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (minusTerm minusA (n:=n) a a)
eqTerm_minusTerm_plusTerm_invTerm : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (minusTerm minusA (n:=n) a b) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a (invTerm invA (n:=n) b))
invTerm_invol : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (invTerm invA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) a))
eqTerm_divTerm_comp : forall (a b c d : Term A n) (nZc : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) c) (nZd : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) d), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) c d -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=c) nZc) (divTerm b (b:=d) nZd)
eqTerm_sym : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall n : nat, symmetric (Term A n) (eqTerm eqA (n:=n))
eqT_divTerm : forall (a b c d : Term A n) (nZc : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) c) (nZd : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) d), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) c d -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=c) nZc) (divTerm b (b:=d) nZd)
divA_is_multA : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a b : A) (nZb : ~ eqA b A0), eqA a (multA (divA a b nZb) b)
divA_eqA_comp : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a b c0 d : A) (nZb : ~ eqA b A0) (nZd : ~ eqA d A0), eqA a c0 -> eqA b d -> eqA (divA a b nZb) (divA c0 d nZd)
eqT_divTerm_plusTerm : forall (a b c : Term A n) (nZc : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) c), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=c) nZc) c) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) b (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm b (b:=c) nZc) c) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (divTerm (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) (b:=c) nZc) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=c) nZc) (divTerm b (b:=c) nZc))
divA_nZ : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> forall nZa : ~ eqA a A0, ~ eqA (divA b a nZa) A0
invA_eqA_comp : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b : A, eqA a b -> eqA (invA a) (invA b)
